scripts.precheck: node scripts/validate-frontmatter.mjs && node scripts/validate-collections-template.mjs && node scripts/validate-feeds-template.mjs && node scripts/validate-nav-config.mjs && node scripts/validate-seo-config.mjs && node scripts/validate-tag-alias.mjs
scripts.gen: node scripts/pagegen.mjs && node scripts/telemetry-merge.mjs && node scripts/chunk-build.mjs

scripts.dev:search: vitepress build docs && npm run search:index && npm run embeddings:build && node -e "import('node:fs').then(fs=>fs.cpSync('docs/public/pagefind','docs/.vitepress/dist/pagefind',{recursive:true}))" && vitepress dev docs --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173
scripts.preview:search: vitepress build docs && npm run search:index && npm run embeddings:build && node -e "import('node:fs').then(fs=>fs.cpSync('docs/public/pagefind','docs/.vitepress/dist/pagefind',{recursive:true}))" && vitepress preview docs --host 0.0.0.0 --port 4173
scripts.ai:all: npm run ai:embed && (npm run ai:summary || true) && (npm run ai:qa || true)
